name: Trijam 144 BAYWATCH
description:
BAYWATCH - save as many people as you can

Hundrets of people (white blobs) need to be rescued by YOU! You have 3 characters (colored blobs) that you can control with WASD. However, you only have one character active at a time; by left mouse clicking you can select the other character. Run into the poor white blobs and they are rescued - WOOHOOO!

Position your life guards in a smart way to maximize the resuce. You got 60 seconds, share your HIGHSCORE in the comments :)

Development time: 170min:

  • Artwork: 45 min
  • Coding/Unity: 120 min
  • Music: 5 min

How does this game fit the Trijam 144 theme "Life Line": You are the actual life line for those poor white blobs. If you are not rescuing them, no one else will - so get your fingers ready for some manic clicking action! Also, who doesn't remember the 80s classic BAYWATCH? If you are into absract characters, then I got you covered with some amazing views...

Credit for the font: 

Boogaloo by SolFonts
